2025-05-21 (WEDNESDAY): CAMPAIGN TARGETING LATIN AMERICAN USERS DISTRIBUTING BTMOB RAT ANDROID MALWARE 

NOTES:

- We have identified new samples of BTMOB RAT Android malware distributed through sites impersonating legitimate services.
- These apps and web pages impersonate legitimate services, including Starlink, Google Chrome, Avast Antivirus, Roku, Amazon and several others.
- These apps are targeting Latin American users.

MORE INFORMATION ON BTMOB RAT ANDROID MALWARE:

- https://cyble.com/blog/btmob-rat-newly-discovered-android-malware/
- https://www.linkedin.com/pulse/critical-android-malware-alert-btmobrat-hijacks-accessibility-jkswc/

IP ADDRESSES AND DOMAIN ASSOCIATED NOTED FROM THIS CAMPAIGN:

- 77.111.101[.]185
- 78.135.93[.]123
- 79.133.57[.]141
- 144.172.104[.]43
- 154.62.226[.]217
- 172.86.67[.]39
- 172.86.70[.]246
- 195.160.221[.]203
- 206.206.125[.]203
- 212.224.88[.]213
- 212.224.88[.]236
- 216.238.107[.]61
- server.yaarsa[.]com
